qrList.label: ü¶Æ
qrList.title: Write in the inputfield a guide for the bots next Response and create a new Response with it.
qrList.message:
/setvar key=inp {{input}} |
// Check for Autotrigger Clothes |
/qr-get set="Guided Addons" label=SysClothes | 
/let qrdetails {{pipe}} | 
/var index=executeOnUser qrdetails | 
/if left={{pipe}} {:
/:"Guided Addons.SysClothes"|
:}|
// Check for AutoTrigger Thinking |
/qr-get set="Guided Addons" label=SysThinking | 
/let qrdetails2 {{pipe}} | 
/var index=executeOnUser qrdetails2 | 
/if left={{pipe}} {:
/:"Guided Addons.SysThinking"|
:}|


/if left={{char}} right="" rule=eq 
	else={:
	/inject id=instruct position=chat depth=0 [{{getvar::inp}}]|
	/trigger await=true
	:} 
	{:
		/split {{group}} |
		/setvar key=x {{pipe}} |
		/buttons labels=x Select members {{group}} |
		/setglobalvar key=selection {{pipe}} |
		/inject id=instruct position=chat depth=0 [{{getvar::inp}}] |
		/trigger await=true {{getglobalvar::selection}}
	:}|
/setinput {{getvar::inp}}|
/flushinjects instruct

qrList.label: ‚û°Ô∏è
qrList.title: Write in the inputfield a guide for the bots next Response and create a new Swipe with it. Works only when the last massage was written from the bot, not on user-messages or intros

qrList.label: ‚úçÔ∏è
qrList.title: Guided Impersonation. Write a rough outline what you want to do and let the LLM flesh it out.
qrList.message:
/ifempty value={{getglobalvar::old_input}} {{input}} |
/setglobalvar key=old_input {{pipe}} |
/ifempty value={{getglobalvar::new_input}} a |
/setglobalvar key=new_input {{pipe}} |

/if left={{input}} rule=eq right={{getglobalvar::new_input}} 
else={:
    /setglobalvar key=old_input {{input}} |
    /impersonate await=true Write in first Person perspective from {{user}}. {{input}} |
    /setglobalvar key=new_input {{input}} |
:}
{:
    /setinput {{getglobalvar::old_input}} |
:} |
